message.body: I can pick you up tomorrow?
######## can not pick ###### up on the day that is tmrw for ###### is still enjoying spring break
Lmao!!!! Right I forgot. Ok do you want to do something tomorrow? Go somewhere? Anything? I get done work at 3:00
###### is a bunch of fun. But tmrw ###### doesnt know how he will feel, what with the studying for the calc the bio and the chem.
So why didn't ###### do that today instead. Besides its only about 1-2 hours you'll be sparing... and why is ###### is referring to himself in 3rd person?? (Is that right)
Any I have to stop over moms tomorrow anyway to give her some containers back. Let me know tomorrow if you feel like hanging out
###### was backing up his computer files today, ###### thinks 2 hours is a long time, ###### also thinks ######## uses incorrect grammar, but yes, it is 3rd person.
Why? Come over tmrw. Robert not ########
Dont be mad. If we went out, you would just have to buy me something...i did need to go to gamestop
